message: Hi I am looking for a Lead Developer/Co Founder for a business with a 70% completed prototype, a fully scoped business model, lucrative revenue streams with a launch within the next 3 months. I am looking for someone with the expertise to take the platform forward and begin the development of the accompanying mobile applications. You will need to be a well rounded individual with a real desire to work for a company in which you have an equity stake. Message me for more information and a little about yourself.
